item.title: MultiVersus Director Teases An 'Insane' Character Reveal
item.description:
Highlights

  • MultiVersus is set to reveal something big on Monday, sparking speculation that Jason Voorhees may join as a playable character.
  • The game has already announced exciting additions like the Joker and Banana Guard becoming a playable fighter.
  • MultiVersus players are eagerly anticipating more character announcements, with the addition of the Powerpuff Girls expected by players. With Jason's rights recently given back to the first film's screenwriter, there is a lot more potential for Friday The 13th crossovers going forward.

MultiVersus director has teased that the game will make a big announcement on Monday, and part of the community believes it will be Jason Vorhees as a playable character. MultiVersus has been heating up with exciting announcements, preparing players for the game's release on May 28.

One of the most impactful reveals so far has been Joker's inclusion in MultiVersus , reuniting Mark Hamill with the character he voiced in the Batman animated series and the Batman: Arkham games. In an unusual twist, MultiVersus announced the Banana Guard , making the charismatic Adventure Time character, who was previously a stage item, one of the playable fighters. Another novelty was the reveal of the PvE Rift mode, in which MultiVersus will fight bosses and play mini-games. Now, MultiVersus is about to make another exciting announcement within the next few days.

Related
MultiVersus Reveals Huge Combat Changes Coming With the May 2024 Relaunch

As the release date for MultiVersus quickly approaches, the platform fighter receives some major changes to its combat mechanics.

According to MultiVersus director Tony Huynh, a big announcement will take place on Monday, and some players believe that the devs will reveal Jason Voorhees, the iconic antagonist of the Friday the 13th horror franchise . Huynh said "Monday will be insane" when quoting the tweet from the official MultiVersus account saying "They aren't done with character reveals." In the comments to the post made by Redditor TheCarina, several players speculate that it could be the addition of Voorhees to the game, a speculation that has been circulating for some time due to various leaks and teasers that point to the character's inclusion in MultiVersus . One of them, for example, is the "horror" category of the PvE mode.

Why the Timing for Announcing Jason Voorhees in MultiVersus Would Be Huge

In addition to the leaks indicating the inclusion of Jason Voorhees in MultiVersus , the timing of the potential announcement would come at a very suitable moment for Friday the 13th . This week saw the announcement of Jason Universe, a multi-platform expansion of the franchise. The announcement comes years after Victor Miller, the screenwriter of the first film, reclaimed the rights to the original Friday the 13th movie in 2021. As a result, Jason, who was part of the Mortal Kombat X cast , would be even more likely to make his big debut in Warner Bros. Interactive's 2D platform fighting game.

MultiVersus enjoyed significant positive feedback from players who played the beta and entered Super Smash Bros -esque matches between characters from the Warner Bros. library. But while Jason Voorhees is one of the characters awaited by MultiVersus players, he's not the only name on the fans' wish list. The community is also eagerly awaiting the announcement of the Powerpuff Girls in MultiVersus , especially because of the future addition of the Townsville stage to the game.

item.title: Minecraft Fan Celebrates 15th Anniversary With Stunning Block Fan Art
item.description:
Highlights

  • Minecraft fans are celebrating its 15th anniversary through awesome fan creations.
  • One player even created amazing Minecraft block art, paying tribute to the game's history.

A talented Minecraft fan online has shared an amazing piece of block fan art, which they have created to commemorate the 15th anniversary of the game's release. Minecraft 's community continues to show its talent through unique pieces like this, and this latest creation pays tribute to a huge birthday for Mojang's legendary title.

Although Minecraft was officially released in full in late 2011, the earliest version of the game was released to the public in May 2009. This means that Minecraft is currently celebrating its 15th birthday, and Mojang is doing plenty to mark the occasion. It was recently confirmed that until May 29, gamers can log into Minecraft to claim free 15th anniversary items , and Mojang has even turned to community map makers to create a free in-game map that players can explore to celebrate. Reaching 15 years old and remaining such a relevant force in the industry is a huge achievement for the game, so it makes sense that Mojang is pulling out all the stops this year.

Related
Google Adds Fun Minecraft Easter Egg

A neat Minecraft Easter egg appears on the Google search engine, bringing a piece of the game into the web at large that fans can play with.

Redditor zombie2mi_nu shared their awesome piece of Minecraft fan art , which celebrates the game's 15th anniversary by recreating a dirt block with a rose on top using in-game characters. It's a genius piece, and a perfect way to look back on the last 15 years of the game's existence. Some in the thread itself even asked if it was available for purchase, in order to hang it on their own walls at home.

Minecraft 15th Anniversary Fan Art

Over the years, the Minecraft community has rapidly expanded, with new generations joining the game each year. It has a true timelessness that is tough for any competitors to match, which is why fans gravitate towards Minecraft when producing fan creations of their own. One Minecraft fan even baked the game's cake in real life , showcasing how these creations can often bleed into the real world, too. With Minecraft poised to stay popular for many years to come, gamers should expect to see plenty more of these types of cool creations for a long time yet.

Even as Minecraft turns 15, it's hard not to think the game still has many years left in the tank at this point. It is so ingrained in pop culture at this point that it's almost impossible to fail. Recent rumors suggest that Minecraft could be making its way to Steam , which would be an interesting move for the best-selling video game of all time. After all, Minecraft certainly isn't lacking in exposure, and its lack of presence on the PC's primary digital storefront definitely hasn't held it back from success. In terms of in-game content, the upcoming Tricky Trials update promises to bring a ton of strong additions to the game, keeping things fresh, even for those who have been playing all 15 years of its lifespan.

item.title: Jynxzi Explains Breckie Hill Break Up
item.description:
Highlights

  • Fans speculated on Jynxzi and Breckie Hill's relationship after seeing them collaborate, with kissing in clips suggesting that they were dating.
  • While they were indeed together for a time, they have since broken up. Jynxzi takes blame for his breakup with Brecki, urging fans not to harass Breckie in an emotional video.
  • Jynxzi says that the relationship failing was mostly on him, as he says Breckie is a "good person" and that he did not put in the effort she deserved.

Jynxzi, the popular Rainbow Six Siege Twitch streamer, has posted a short TikTok clip detailing his breakup with Instagram model Breckie Hill. The Twitch star mentioned that he was actually the one at fault for the relationship’s demise and urged his online fans not to harass Breckie over the breakup.

Breckie Hill, a huge TikTok star in her own right, became famous for her captivating dance and lip-sync videos on the social media platform. Back in February 2024, Breckie joined Jynxzi’s Twitch stream for the first time. Many viewers thought there was a certain level of chemistry between the pair, and since then, the two started collaborating on more and more streams. Later on, the couple were even seen kissing in their clips, leading fans to believe they had officially started dating.

Related
Twitch Has Banned Alinity

Popular Twitch streamer Alinity has hit her newest roadblock in her streaming career, but the website has given her a path to return.

Unfortunately, just a few months later, the couple would seemingly break up, as evidenced by a TikTok clip posted by the most subscribed Twitch streamer . In the 2-minute and 8-second long video, Jynxzi stated that even though he initially didn’t plan on making a video regarding the breakup, he felt he had to. Jynxzi started off his explanation of the unfortunate situation by clarifying to fans that he had not been cheated on and that Breckie was a “good girl and a good person.” Jynxzi went on to say the reason for the breakup was the fact that he hadn’t put as much effort into the relationship as Breckie had and that he was mostly at fault for the relationship’s failure.

She genuinely cared about me more than I ever knew I could be cared about, and loved, I genuinely mean that.

Jynxzi Doesn't Want Fans To Harass Breckie

Throughout the video, Jynxzi seemed as though he was on the edge of tears. The heartbroken-sounding streamer went on to say that if fans genuinely cared about him, they should leave Breckie alone, and not harass her. Jynxzi also stated that his relationship with Breckie may not be totally over and that he didn’t want to “give up on it.” Even though the Twitch streamer is going through an emotional time right now, Jynxzi’s partnerships with popular companies like Scruf and Ubisoft are evidence of just how popular he is with his fans. Achieving this level of popularity on the platform means that Jynxzi won’t have to look very far to find someone to talk to about how he is feeling post-breakup.

Jynxzi is currently the number one Twitch streamer with 128,155 subscribers according to Twitchtracker. Recently, his popularity was rewarded by Ubisoft with a special Rainbow Six Siege Jynxzi skin and cosmetics .

item.title: Pokemon Unite Fan Designs Impressive Mewtwo Outfits
item.description:
Highlights

  • Pokemon Unite remains popular years after its release, with upcoming events like the 2024 Pokemon World Championships and an active community keeping it relevant.
  • A talented fan has design outfits for Pokemon Unite's Mewtwo, with one inspired by an in-game costume and another being an original concept.
  • The first design is a Martial Arts Style X outfit, while the second costume gives Mewtwo a maid makeover.

A Pokemon Unite fan designed incredible outfits for Legendary Pokemon Mewtwo, with one of the concepts being inspired by one of Mewtwo's existing costumes in the game. In Pokemon Unite , players may obtain outfits for Mewtwo and other playable Pokemon by trading Aeos Gems and participating in in-game events.

First released in July 2021 for Nintendo Switch, Pokemon Unite is a 5v5 MOBA that sees players control their favorite Pokemon on the field and vie for victory within a ten-minute limit. Pokemon Unite came to mobile devices just a few months after the Switch release in September 2021, bringing cross-play support with the mobile launch. Occasionally, Pokemon Unite features limited-time game modes with different objectives, giving players a unique experience outside the core game mode. Participating in limited-time game modes and other seasonal activities can help players earn enticing rewards, including new outfits for select Pokemon.

Related
Pokemon GO Announces New May 2024 Event

Pokemon GO officially reveals a brand-new event coming to the game later in May, featuring a fifth-generation Grass Pokemon in the spotlight.

Reddit user Achromaticlabrys recently designed two outfits for Mewtwo from Pokemon Unite , with the first being their own rendition of Mewtwo's Martial Arts Style X Holowear and the second being an original maid costume. The new artwork quickly garnered attention from Pokemon fans in the Reddit community, as Mewtwo is rarely ever seen with clothing in Pokemon games. Other fans associate Mewtwo's Martial Arts Style X outfit with Chun-Li from Street Fighter , since the characters' outfits share very similar designs. Moreover, many of the Reddit users in the thread were caught off guard by the maid design for Mewtwo, which has a head accessory with cat ears.

Pokemon Unite Fan Designs Two Outfits for Mewtwo

In Pokemon Unite , players may obtain the Martial Arts Style and Pokebuki outfits for Mewtwo X and Mewtwo Y by trading in Aeos Gems at Zirco Trading. A Dark Lord Style outfit was available for a limited time during Pokemon Unite Season 20 as a reward from the Premium Battle Pass. Season 20 ran from December 5, 2023, to January 16, 2024. Currently, players may participate in the new Dragon Carnival event in Pokemon Unite to earn new rewards during Season 23, which ends on June 5.

Nearly three years after its release, Pokemon Unite is still one of the most actively played games in the entire Pokemon franchise. The upcoming 2024 Pokemon World Championships event will feature Pokemon Unite , Pokemon GO , Pokemon Scarlet and Violet , and Pokemon TCG . The annual event will run from August 16 to August 18, as players compete to become the best Pokemon Trainers of 2024.

item.title: Honkai: Star Rail 2.2 Chart Shows Most Picked Characters for Memory of Chaos
item.description:
Highlights

  • Players must build powerful rosters to clear tough stages and collect rewards in Honkai: Star Rail.
  • Aventurine is the top pick for Memory of Chaos, providing allies with shields and survivability. Acheron, Sparkle, and Huohuo are close behind.
  • Different combat modes offer varied challenges and rewards, resetting regularly for players to enjoy.

A Honkai: Star Rail chart shows the most picked characters in version 2.2 Memory of Chaos, giving players an idea of the current meta. Honkai: Star Rail 's Memory of Chaos is a dungeon that consists of multiple combat stages filled with enemies. It functions similarly to Genshin Impact 's Spiral Abyss domain, providing players with a buff to help them fulfill objectives. Completing all the Memory of Chaos stages every two weeks gives 600 Stellar Jades, which can be used to buy several Special Rail Passes.

In addition to Stellar Jades, Honkai: Star Rail 's Memory of Chaos gives players thousands of Credits as a completion reward. These common currencies are used for basic actions, such as leveling up characters and enhancing their Light Cones. In order to get more Credits, players must fulfill stage objectives and collect Insignias.

Related
Honkai: Star Rail Leak Teases Upcoming Patches

Recent leaks from Honkai: Star Rail are teasing the contents of several upcoming patches, hinting at multiple characters on the way.

A new Honkai: Star Rail chart , shared by IcyPalpitation4553 on Reddit, has revealed the most popular units for version 2.2 Memory of Chaos. Aventurine boasts the highest usage rate, with 93.5% of surveyed players putting the five-star Preservation unit on their respective teams. Honkai: Star Rail 's Acheron , on the other hand, is in second place with an impressive 86.9% rate.

Most Used Honkai: Star Rail Characters for Memory of Chaos

  • Aventurine (93.5%)
  • Acheron (86.9%)
  • Sparkle (84.5%)
  • Huohuo (82.9%)
  • Fu Xuan (76.9%)
  • Robin (76.2%)
  • Black Swan (75.7%)
  • Ruan Mei (74.6%)
  • Dan Heng Imbibitor Lunae (69.4%)
  • Topaz and Numby (69.4%)

Sparkle and Huohuo are among the most picked Memory of Chaos units with 84.5% and 82.9% rates, respectively. Also, the newly-introduced Robin has a higher usage rate (76.2%) than many five-star characters, including Black Swan (75.7%), Ruan Mei (74.6%), Dan Heng Imbibitor Lunae (69.4%), Topaz and Numby (61.8%), and Kafka (61.6%).

It's no surprise that Honkai: Star Rail 's Aventurine is at the top of the list, since he provides all allies with a sturdy shield and increases their survivability. The five-star Imaginary character scales off defense and protects himself against crowd control. Moreover, thanks to Aventurine's talent, his allies gain resistance by at least 25%. He sustains the whole team and delivers a reasonable amount of Imaginary damage.

Honkai: Star Rail players who want to clear all the Memory of Chaos stages and collect generous rewards must first create a powerful roster, as they will encounter some of the hardest enemies in the game. They are well advised to build their teams on a decent DPS character that can deliver consistent damage.

Honkai: Star Rail features different combat modes , such as Memory of Chaos, Simulated Universe, and Pure Fiction, that set players against different types of enemies. They make the endgame grind much better, giving players materials that they can use to ascend units and Light Cones. Moreover, some of these modes give four-star characters like Herta and Lynx, with whom Travelers can expand their rosters. The common thing between these modes is that they all reset periodically.
